@kamatisnadurog Hello Liyag. Power bank is accepted for hand carry. Item  must NOT exceed 100Wh (equivalent to about 20,000mAh to 27,000mAh depending on the output voltage). We hope this helps!
@ncthoew We are sorry but you can only make another changes in your booking once booking is confirmed with no amount due. Thanks.
@joycemananquil3 click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents. Stay safe!

data.text: @joycemananquil3 Hi joycemananquil3! We transitioned our customer service channels to support contactless processes for the safety of our passengers. For assistance and security of your personal information, please send us a message through Charlie. Visit https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi,
@dian018ray Thanks for raising this. Kindly consider in clearing your cache, cookies and search history then try again. You may also use other browser. Thank you

@MarikuBorlado Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Mariku. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@FormerlyJehsee Hi there, FormerlyJehsee! Microwave oven is accepted for check-in. Please make sure that it is properly packed to avoid damage. Thank you.

@ncthoew Hello ncthoew. Please be advised that ancillary such as baggage cannot be removed/cancelled anymore once added to a booking whether this is paid or not. You may still settle the amount due up to 2 hours before your flight. Stay safe!

@KellyMFernandes Hi Kelly! Thanks for reaching to us. As per checking, itinerary was indeed sent already on both the email addresses provided. It has been successfully sent several times already. Kindly check the spam or junk folder if not reflecting in the inbox. Thank you

@KellyMFernandes Hi Kelly! Thanks for reaching to us. As pe checking, the itinerary was sent on both the email address provided. It has been successfully sent several times already. Kindly double check your spam or junk email if not reflecting on the inbox. Thank you
@MitzMitx Travel fund is non-convertible to cash also, Mitx. Thank you
@MitzMitx Hi Mitx! Please be advised that travel fund is non-refundable. If unused, it will be considered as forfeited. Thank you
@rmds1995 Means that you have to take care of the item to avoid accidental activation, rmds1995.

data.text: @shyla69041666 We are sorry to hear about this, shyla. We will help you look into this matter. For assistance and security of your personal information you may send the details of your concern through: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you with the live agent. Thank you!
@reilasay We are glad to hear that you were being assisted already with the concern, Rei. Have a good day and thanks for your patience.

@rogieromero Thanks for providing the case number, Rogie and we are sorry also for the inconvenience. Kindly note that we already send a follow-up with the handler to check the status of your refund. Please monitor your email for an update. Thank you
@reilasay Just to clarify, this will be a correction of name of the same person, right? If so, kindly send us a message thru our live agent so we can further assist you with the amendment. Thank you

@reilasay Hi Rei! Kindly note that name correction may be done online if the booking is still within 24hours from its creation. Otherwise, you may send us a message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents for further assistance. Thanks!

@heydannixx Hi danni! As of now, no advisory  regarding the resume of these routes. But you may always check our website and social media accounts for any announcement related to this concern. Thank you

@ultwenjhui Hi ultwenjhui! Philhealth ID is accepted upon check-in. Make sure that the name of the passenger - exactly as it is shown on the valid identification card which will be presented upon check-in. Stay safe!
@ninjapikachu05 Yes, justine. You may use other available form of payment to settle the excess amount on top of your travel fund. Thank you

@JBSmith1966 Hi Ruchel! If you are looking for a specific fare, route and/or flight schedule, please visit our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam.  For the latest seat sale, you may refer to https://t.co/kGsg6DVkSv. Thank you and hope to see you onboard!

@JBSmith1966 We are sorry to hear this, JB Smith. For us to check on the concern further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@yangsunoz Hi @yangsunoz! To check on your concern further and for the security of the details we'll be needing, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@dian018ray We are sorry to hear your frustrations, @dian018ray. For us to assist you and check on your refund concern further, please send us the details thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@cjbayron Thanks for raising the concern, Cj. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

data.text: @herbivoreslave We will help you look into it Pat. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@krungybianca Expectant mothers must fill out all three (3) copies of the Passenger Handling Form, to be presented upon check-in. Please click this link for the Passenger Handling Form https://t.co/cxVV5TA8EV. Thank you!

@krungybianca Except for flights to or from the United States, the expectant mother must complete her travel within the validity period of the medical certificate which should be ten (10) days from date of issuance.

data.text: @krungybianca Hi Bianca! Tel here. On all flights, expectant mothers with age of gestation thirty-four (34) weeks and beyond, are required to present a medical certificate with the notation "Fit to Travel" and signed by a physician.

@lizlaz_crypto Hi @lizlaz_crypto! Thanks for raising the concern. To check on it, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and chat with our live chat agents or thru Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@_trxgrc Thanks for providing the case number, @_trxgrc. We'll have this endorsed to a handler for further checking and assistance. Kindly monitor your assistance for an update/response. Thank you

@_trxgrc For us to further check on this, kindly send us an email with a screenshot of your concern thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@_trxgrc Hence, pending amount shall be settled to reconfirm the ticket. Thank you

@_trxgrc We are sorry to hear your frustrations, @_trxrc. Kindly note that as indicated on the conditions of carriage read and agreed upon booking, any voluntary booking changes can no longer be reverted once done whether this is paid or not.

@chaeee_09 Thanks for raising the concern, Chae. To check on it, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and chat with our live chat agents or thru Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

@ncthoew Hi there! be advised that we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with our live agents to send the details we are needing. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@unlirace Hi Race! Kindly note that any voluntary booking changes can no longer be reverted once done whether this is paid or not. The pending amount needs to be settled to reconfirm the booking. Thank you

@jennypurr_ Hello Jnny! Thank you for raising the concern, RJ. To check on the concern further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@ultwenjhui Hi! It may be used also for check-in as long as it is the latest issued ID. Thank you
@1218dddd HI 1218dddd. May we ask what did you do if you did not click proceed? May we know if you close the tab?
@ultwenjhui Hi @ultwenjhui! PVC Type Philhealth ID may be accepted as valid ID for check-in. Thank you
@ncthoew May we have the email address you used to send an email to our Group booking? Thank you

@ncthoew We are sorry to hear your frustrations, BBieGurl. We hope that you give us another opportunity to be of better service with you again. Rest assured that we are doing pour best to improve our services to assist you better. Thank you.

@shanicesideup We are sorry if you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent, shanice. You may also accomplish our Guest Feedback Form through this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Stay safe!
@dustin_reyes Hi Dustin! For 20kgs baggage allowance, only 1 piece is allowed. Any excess or extra bag will be subject to a corresponding fee to be collected at the airport. Thank you

@talskidoo We are sorry to hear your dismay, talskidoo. For us to check on the concern further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@1218dddd We are sorry to hear this. Kindly be advised that as indicated on the conditions of carriage, read and agreed upon booking, that any voluntary changes made on the booking can no longer be reverted whether this is paid or not and this includes the adding of baggage. Thank you

@iheart1103 Hi Dianne! Minors 2 years old and above can no longer be added to an existing booking. Such are to be booked separately. For further assistance, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@1218dddd Hi dddddddd! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@claristimbang Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, claristimbang. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@iheart1103 Hi Dianne! Note that only infant age 0 to below 2 years old can be added to an existing booking. Otherwise, minor will be booked separately. Thank you

@shygrape Hi ghis! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@arji_74 Hi, RG!  Bern here. You may check on our existing promotional fares in our website https://t.co/wngAzjsqbM. See you on-board!
@KellyMFernandes Got this Kelly. I'll reach out to a case owner and will respond to you soon. For the meantime, please monitor your email.

@unlirace If you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent Race. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

data.text: @yekatoong I'm sorry to hear this Yeka. The Senior Citizen discount does not apply to: -Promotional fares with discount higher than 20% of the lowest Go fare - Add-ons such as baggage allowance or inflight meals - International flights or connecting flights with international sector.
